config.script:
menuDS = settings.getValue("Global", "menu")


	for row in range(menuDS.getRowCount()):
		order = menuDS.getValueAt(row,"order")
		if row == 0:
			minOrder = order
			rootRow = row
		elif order < minOrder:
			minOrder = order
			rootRow = row
	
	rootURL = menuDS.getValueAt(rootRow, "pageURL")
	
	system.perspective.navigate(rootURL[1:])
